ValidationRule.description: Makes users go through each status in a lead
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CASE(Status, "1-Lead Identified",1, "2-Insurance Verification Completed",2, "3-Intake Completed",3, "4-BPS Completed",4, "5-Clinical Clearance Completed",5, "6-SOC Sceduled",6, "7-SOC Complete",7, "9-Unqualified",8, "On Hold",9, "Converted",10, 0) > CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), "1-Lead Identified",1, "2-Insurance Verification Completed",2, "3-Intake Completed",3, 0) + 1
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure that "Insurance Carrier Name" is complete in order to move forward.
